mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_EMPLOYEE (
emp_no,
emp_nm,
emp_sts,
lob_id,
emp_sex,
emp_birthday,
join_date,
dept_uuid,
dept_nm,
org_uuid,
org_nm,
tel_no,
mb_no,
mail,
position_name,
position_id,
position_id_fix,
active_flg,
created_staff_id,
updated_staff_id,
date_created,
last_updated,
emp_uuid,
has_other_position,
is_main_position,
login_id,
login_pwd,
emp_nm_spell,
is_allow_login,
created_staff_nm,
updated_staff_nm,
emp_prop,
pwd_err_cunt
)values(
#{empno},
#{empnm},
#{empsts},
#{lobid},
#{empsex},
#{empbirthday},
#{joindate},
#{deptuuid},
#{deptnm},
#{orguuid},
#{orgnm},
#{telno},
#{mbno},
#{mail},
#{positionname},
#{positionid},
#{positionidfix},
#{activeflg},
#{createdstaffid},
#{updatedstaffid},
#{datecreated},
#{lastupdated},
#{empuuid},
#{hasotherposition},
#{ismainposition},
#{loginid},
#{loginpwd},
#{empnmspell},
#{isallowlogin},
#{createdstaffnm},
#{updatedstaffnm},
#{empprop},
#{pwderrcunt}
)
mapper.select: select c.menu_id, m.permisssion from BAP.t_Bap_Sys_Menu m, BAP.t_Bap_Sys_Role_Menu c, BAP.T_BAP_SYS_ROLE e where c.menu_id = m.menu_id and e.role_id=c.role_id and e.ATV_FLG<>1 and c.role_id in (select g.role_id from BAP.t_Bap_Sys_User_Role g where g.user_id = #{userId})
select auto.rmk as "rmk", auto.AUD_BNO as "audBno" from SES.T_SES_AUTO_PAY_BAT auto where auto.BAT_STATUS in ('01','03','05') and auto.CT_DT = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')

select emp_no,emp_nm,emp_sts,lob_id,emp_sex,emp_birthday,join_date,dept_uuid,dept_nm,org_uuid,org_nm,tel_no,mb_no,mail,position_name,position_id,position_id_fix,active_flg,created_staff_id,updated_staff_id,date_created,last_updated,emp_uuid,has_other_position,is_main_position,login_id,login_pwd,emp_nm_spell,is_allow_login,created_staff_nm,updated_staff_nm,emp_prop,pwd_err_cunt from UAP.SYS_EMPLOYEE where login_id = #{loginId} and rownum = 1
